definition: history/annals/title of an official historian in ancient China
abbr. for Shijing 詩經|诗经[Shi1 jing1], the Book of Songs

sentences.english: Welcome to a world where you shape the epic sagas that will be told to future generations.
sentences.chinese: 欢迎来到这个留芳千古的史诗传奇般故事的世界。

sentences.english: The contents in the Shibis' talking and singing are epics of the historical development of the Qiang people.
sentences.chinese: 释比说唱的内容就是一部部羌民族历史发展的史诗。

sentences.english: Odyssey is an epic of ancient Greece.
sentences.chinese: 《奥德塞》是古希腊的一首史诗。

sentences.english: When you were a young boy, you would've studied just reading and writing Homer.
sentences.chinese: 希腊男子在幼年时，要学习阅读书写荷马史诗。

sentences.english: Los Angeles: Every Olympics has its epic moments.
sentences.chinese: 每一届奥运都有它的史诗时刻。

sentences.english: Shoda's last epic poem became just as performative as it was poetic.
sentences.chinese: 栗原贞子最后一首史诗是如诗似诗，也是行事语言。

sentences.english: It is a debatable issue in academic circles whether the Han nationality had epic in its early stage of history.
sentences.chinese: 学术界在汉民族有无史诗的问题上一直聚讼纷纭。

sentences.english: The next year- he published The Rape of the Lock- an attemptodst mock epic.
sentences.chinese: 次年，他又出版了《夺发记》，一部极妙的讥笑史诗。

sentences.english: Poem of the Motherland, cantata for 5 soloists, chorus & orchestra.
sentences.chinese: 为独唱5，合唱队和管弦乐队而作的祖国史诗康塔塔。

sentences.english: Movie theatres showed documentaries and heroic epics.
sentences.chinese: 电影院放映着战争纪录片和英雄们的史诗片。

sentences.english: Oral epics are a lasting cultural phenomenon among nations all around the world.
sentences.chinese: 口传史诗是世界上许多民族都流传不息的文化现象。

sentences.english: And the epic opens before the formation of heaven and earth.
sentences.chinese: 史诗开始叙述的是天地还未成形之前。

sentences.english: From C. S. Lewis' Epic Masterpiece.
His new film is an epic of the nomads.
sentences.chinese: 他新拍的这部电影是游牧民族的一部史诗。

sentences.english: Epic Gesar is a live form folk culture .
sentences.chinese: 《格萨尔》史诗是一部活形态的民间文化。

sentences.english: Who is the Marine with the revolver and the epic mustache?
sentences.chinese: 那个用左轮枪留着史诗般胡子的陆战队员是谁？

definition: surging forward with great momentum/unfolding on a magnificent scale
legendary/fantasy saga/romance/short stories of the Tang and Song Dynasty
